gen:link.msg:message: Gerapporteerde waarde van `FinancingDeficitSurplusToBeSettledInRates` aan het einde van de periode BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de gerapporteerde waarde van `FinancingDeficitSurplusToBeSettledInRates` aan het begin van de periode en de mutaties gedurende de periode, `FinancingDeficitSurplusToBeSettledInRatesMovement`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedFinancingDeficitSurplusToBeSettledInRatesMovementHealthCare_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_FinancingDeficitSurplusToBeSettledInRatesEnd')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedFinancingDeficitSurplusToBeSettledInRatesMovementHealthCare_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_FinancingDeficitSurplusToBeSettledInRatesEnd return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedFinancingDeficitSurplusToBeSettledInRatesMovementHealthCare_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_FinancingDeficitSurplusToBeSettledInRatesStart')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedFinancingDeficitSurplusToBeSettledInRatesMovementHealthCare_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_FinancingDeficitSurplusToBeSettledInRatesStart return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedFinancingDeficitSurplusToBeSettledInRatesMovementHealthCare_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_FinancingDeficitSurplusToBeSettledInRatesMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedFinancingDeficitSurplusToBeSettledInRatesMovementHealthCare_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_FinancingDeficitSurplusToBeSettledInRatesMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`FinancingDeficitSurplusToBeSettledInRatesMovement` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedFinancingDeficitSurplusToBeSettledInRatesMovementHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_FinancingDeficitSurplusToBeSettledInRatesMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedFinancingDeficitSurplusToBeSettledInRatesMovementHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_FinancingDeficitSurplusToBeSettledInRatesMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedFinancingDeficitSurplusToBeSettledInRatesMovementHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfFinancingDeficitSurplusToBeSettledInRatesMovementCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedFinancingDeficitSurplusToBeSettledInRatesMovementHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfFinancingDeficitSurplusToBeSettledInRatesMovementCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedFinancingDeficitSurplusToBeSettledInRatesMovementHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfFinancingDeficitSurplusToBeSettledInRatesMovementDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedFinancingDeficitSurplusToBeSettledInRatesMovementHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfFinancingDeficitSurplusToBeSettledInRatesMovementDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
